title: sa_śivamahimnastava
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
  <div>

<lg xml:id='Smst_1'>
<l>mahimnaḥ pāraṃ te paramaviduṣo yady asadṛśī <lb/>stutir brahmādīnām api tadavasannās tvayi giraḥ |</l>
<l>athāvācyaḥ sarvaḥ svamatipariṇāmāvadhi gṛṇan <lb/>mamāpy eṣa stotre hara nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_1'>
<lg>
<l>mahimnaḥ pāraṃ te paramaviduṣo yady asadṛśī <lb/>stutir brahmādīnām api tadavasannās tvayi giraḥ |</l>
<l>atha avācyaḥ sarvaḥ svamatipariṇāmāvadhi gṛṇan <lb/>mama apy eṣa stotre hara nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_2'>
<l>atītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayor <lb/>atadvyāvṛttyā yaṃ cakitam abhidhatte śrutir api |</l>
<l>sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ <lb/>pade tv arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_2'>
<lg>
<l>atītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayor <lb/>atadvyāvṛttyā yaṃ cakitam abhidhatte śrutir api |</l>
<l>sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ <lb/>pade tv arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_3'>
<l>madhusphītā vācaḥ paramam amṛtaṃ nirmitavatas <lb/>tava brahman kiṃ vāg api suraguror vismayapadam |</l>
<l>mama tv etāṃ vāṇīṃ guṇakathanapuṇyena bhavataḥ <lb/>punāmīty arthe 'smin puramathana buddhir vyavasitā ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_3'>
<lg>
<l>madhusphītā vācaḥ paramam amṛtaṃ nirmitavatas <lb/>tava brahman kiṃ vāg api suraguror vismayapadam |</l>
<l>mama tv etāṃ vāṇīṃ guṇakathanapuṇyena bhavataḥ <lb/>punāmi ity arthe 'smin puramathana buddhir vyavasitā ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_4'>
<l>tavaiśvaryaṃ yat taj jagadudayarakṣāpralayakṛt <lb/>trayīvastu vyastaṃ tisṛṣu guṇabhinnāsu tanuṣu |</l>
<l>abhavyānām asmin varada ramaṇīyām aramaṇīṃ <lb/>vihantuṃ vyākrośīṃ vidadhata ihaike jaḍadhiyaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_4'>
<lg>
<l>tavā eśvaryaṃ yat taj jagadudayarakṣāpralayakṛt <lb/>trayīvastu vyastaṃ tisṛṣu guṇabhinnāsu tanuṣu |</l>
<l>abhavyānām asmin varada ramaṇīyām aramaṇīṃ <lb/>vihantuṃ vyākrośīṃ vidadhata iha eke jaḍadhiyaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_5'>
<l>kimīhaḥ kiṃkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyas tribhuvanaṃ <lb/>kimādhāro dhātā sṛjati kimupādāna iti ca |</l>
<l>atarkyaiśvarye tvayy anavasaraduḥstho hatadhiyaḥ <lb/>kutarko 'yaṃ kāṃścin mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_5'>
<lg>
<l>kimīhaḥ kiṃkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyas tribhuvanaṃ <lb/>kimādhāro dhātā sṛjati kimupādāna iti ca |</l>
<l>atarkyaiśvarye tvayy anavasaraduḥstho hatadhiyaḥ <lb/>kutarko 'yaṃ kāṃścin mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_6'>
<l>ajanmāno lokāḥ kim avayavavanto 'pi jagatām <lb/>adhiṣṭhātāraṃ kiṃ bhavavidhir anādṛtya bhavati |</l>
<l>anīśo vā kuryād bhuvanajanane kaḥ parikaro <lb/>yato mandās tvāṃ praty amaravara saṃśerata ime ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_6'>
<lg>
<l>ajanmāno lokāḥ kim avayavavanto 'pi jagatām <lb/>adhiṣṭhātāraṃ kiṃ bhavavidhir anādṛtya bhavati |</l>
<l>anīśo vā kuryād bhuvanajanane kaḥ parikaro <lb/>yato mandās tvāṃ praty amaravara saṃśerata ime ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_7'>
<l>trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavam iti <lb/>prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca |</l>
<l>rucīnāṃ vaicitryād ṛjukuṭilanānāpathajuṣāṃ <lb/>nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasām arṇava iva ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_7'>
<lg>
<l>trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavam iti <lb/>prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca |</l>
<l>rucīnāṃ vaicitryād ṛjukuṭilanānāpathajuṣāṃ <lb/>nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasām arṇava iva ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_8'>
<l>mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśur ajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ <lb/>kapālaṃ cetīyat tava varada tantropakaraṇam |</l>
<l>surās tāṃ tām ṛddhiṃ dadhati tu bhavadbhrūpraṇihitāṃ <lb/>na hi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_8'>
<lg>
<l>mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśur ajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ <lb/>kapālaṃ ca iti iyat tava varada tantropakaraṇam |</l>
<l>surās tāṃ tām ṛddhiṃ dadhati tu bhavadbhrūpraṇihitāṃ <lb/>na hi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_9'>
<l>dhruvaṃ kaścit sarvaṃ sakalam aparas tv adhruvam idaṃ <lb/>paro dhrauvyādhrauvye jagati gadati vyastaviṣaye |</l>
<l>samaste 'py etasmin puramathana tair vismita iva <lb/>stuvañ jihremi tvāṃ na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_9'>
<lg>
<l>dhruvaṃ kaścit sarvaṃ sakalam aparas tv adhruvam idaṃ <lb/>paro dhrauvyādhrauvye jagati gadati vyastaviṣaye |</l>
<l>samaste 'py etasmin puramathana tair vismita iva <lb/>stuvañ jihremi tvāṃ na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_10'>
<l>tavaiśvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adhaḥ <lb/>paricchettuṃ yātāv analam analaskandhavapuṣaḥ |</l>
<l>tato bhaktiśraddhābharagurugṛṇadbhyāṃ giriśa yat <lb/>svayaṃ tasthe tābhyāṃ tava kim anuvṛttir na phalati ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_10'>
<lg>
<l>tavā eśvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adhaḥ <lb/>paricchettuṃ yātāv analam analaskandhavapuṣaḥ |</l>
<l>tato bhaktiśraddhābharagurugṛṇadbhyāṃ giriśa yat <lb/>svayaṃ tasthe tābhyāṃ tava kim anuvṛttir na phalati ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_11'>
<l>ayatnād āpādya tribhuvanam avairavyatikaraṃ <lb/>daśāsyo yad bāhūn abhṛta raṇakaṇḍūparavaśān |</l>
<l>śiraḥpadmaśreṇīracitacaraṇāmbhoruhabaleḥ <lb/>sthirāyās tvadbhaktes tripurahara visphūrjitam idam ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_11'>
<lg>
<l>ayatnād āpādya tribhuvanam avairavyatikaraṃ <lb/>daśāsyo yad bāhūn abhṛta raṇakaṇḍūparavaśān |</l>
<l>śiraḥpadmaśreṇīracitacaraṇāmbhoruhabaleḥ <lb/>sthirāyās tvadbhaktes tripurahara visphūrjitam idam ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_12'>
<l>amuṣya tvatsevāsamadhigatasāraṃ bhujavanaṃ <lb/>balāt kailāse 'pi tvadadhivasatau vikramayataḥ |</l>
<l>alabhyā pātāle 'py alasacalitāṅguṣṭhaśirasi <lb/>pratiṣṭhā tvayy āsīd dhruvam upacito muhyati khalaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_12'>
<lg>
<l>amuṣya tvatsevāsamadhigatasāraṃ bhujavanaṃ <lb/>balāt kailāse 'pi tvadadhivasatau vikramayataḥ |</l>

</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_13'>
<l>yadṛddhiṃ sutrāmṇo varada paramoccair api satīm <lb/>adhaś cakre bāṇaḥ parijanavidheyatribhuvanaḥ |</l>
<l>na tac citraṃ tasmin varivasitari tvaccaraṇayor <lb/>na kasyā unnatyai bhavati śirasas tvayy avanatiḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_13'>
<lg>
<l>yadṛddhiṃ sutrāmṇo varada paramoccair api satīm <lb/>adhaś cakre bāṇaḥ parijanavidheyatribhuvanaḥ |</l>
<l>na tac citraṃ tasmin varivasitari tvaccaraṇayor <lb/>na kasyā unnatyai bhavati śirasas tvayy avanatiḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_14'>
<l>akāṇḍabrahmāṇḍakṣayacakitadevāsurakṛpā<orig/><lb/>vidheyasyāsīd yas trinayana viṣaṃ saṃhṛtavataḥ |</l>
<l>na kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho <lb/>vikāro 'pi ślāghyo bhuvananbhayabhaṅgavyasaninaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_14'>
<lg>
<l>akāṇḍabrahmāṇḍakṣayacakitadevāsurakṛpā<orig>-</orig><lb/>vidheyasyā asīd yas trinayana viṣaṃ saṃhṛtavataḥ |</l>
<l>na kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho <lb/>vikāro 'pi ślāghyo bhuvananbhayabhaṅgavyasaninaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_15'>
<l>asiddhārthā naiva kvacid api sadevāsuranare <lb/>nivartante nityaṃ jagati jayino yasya viśikhāḥ |</l>
<l>sa paśyan īśa tvām itarasurasādhāraṇam abhūt <lb/>smaraḥ smartavyātmā na hi vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_15'>
<lg>
<l>asiddhārthā na eva kvacid api sadevāsuranare <lb/>nivartante nityaṃ jagati jayino yasya viśikhāḥ |</l>
<l>sa paśyan īśa tvām itarasurasādhāraṇam abhūt <lb/>smaraḥ smartavyātmā na hi vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_16'>
<l>mahī pādāghātād vrajati sahasā saṃśayapadaṃ <lb/>padaṃ viṣṇor bhrāmyadbhujaparigharugṇagrahagaṇam |</l>
<l>muhur dyaur dauḥsthyaṃ yāty anibhṛtajaṭātāḍitataṭā <lb/>jagadrakṣāyai tvaṃ naṭasi nanu vāmaiva vibhutā ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_16'>
<lg>
<l>mahī pādāghātād vrajati sahasā saṃśayapadaṃ <lb/>padaṃ viṣṇor bhrāmyadbhujaparigharugṇagrahagaṇam |</l>
<l>muhur dyaur dauḥsthyaṃ yāty anibhṛtajaṭātāḍitataṭā <lb/>jagadrakṣāyai tvaṃ naṭasi nanu vāma aiva vibhutā ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_17'>
<l>viyadvyāpī tārāgaṇaguṇitaphenodgamaruciḥ <lb/>pravāho vārāṃ yaḥ pṛṣ.atalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te |</l>
<l>jagad dvīpākāraṃ jaladhivalayaṃ tena kṛtam ity <lb/>anenaivonneyaṃ dhṛtamahima divyaṃ tava vapuḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_17'>
<lg>
<l>viyadvyāpī tārāgaṇaguṇitaphenodgamaruciḥ <lb/>pravāho vārāṃ yaḥ pṛṣ.atalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te |</l>
<l>jagad dvīpākāraṃ jaladhivalayaṃ tena kṛtam ity <lb/>anena eva unneyaṃ dhṛtamahima divyaṃ tava vapuḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Smst_18'>
<l>rathaḥ kṣoṇī yantā śatadhṛtir agendro dhanur atho <lb/>rathāṅge candrārkau rathacaraṇapāṇiḥ śara iti |</l>
<l>didhakṣos te ko 'yaṃ tripuratṛṇam āḍambaravidhir <lb/>vidheyaiḥ krīḍantyo na khalu paratantrāḥ prabhudhiyaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_18'>
<lg>

<lg xml:id='Smst_19'>
<l>haris te sāhasraṃ kamalabalim ādhāya padayor <lb/>yad ekone tasmin nijam udaharan netrakamalam |</l>
<l>gato bhaktyudrekaḥ pariṇatim asau cakravapuṣā <lb/>trayāṇāṃ rakṣāyai tripurahara jāgarti jagatām ||</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='Smst_20'>
<l>kratau supte jāgrat tvam asi phalayoge kratumatāṃ <lb/>kva karma pradhvastaṃ palati puruṣārādhanam ṛte |</l>
<l>atas tvāṃ samprekṣya tratuṣu phaladānapratibhuvaṃ <lb/>śrutau śraddhāṃ baddhvā dṛḍhaparikaraḥ karmasu janaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_20'>

<lg xml:id='Smst_21'>
<l>kriyādakṣo dakṣaḥ kratupatir adhīśas tanubhṛtām <lb/>ṛṣīṇām ārtvijyaṃ śaraṇada sadasyāḥ suragaṇāḥ |</l>
<l>kratubhraṃśas tvattaḥ kratuphalavidhānavyasanino <lb/>dhruvaṃ kartuḥ śraddhāvidhuram abhicārāya hi makhāḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_21'>

<lg xml:id='Smst_22'>
<l>prajānāthaṃ prasabham abhikaṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ <lb/>gataṃ rohidbhūtāṃ riramayiṣum ṛśyasya vapuṣā |</l>

<lg xml:id='Smst_23'>
<l>svalāvaṇyāśaṃsādhṛtadhanuṣam ahnāya tṛṇavat <lb/>puraḥ pluṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā puramathana puṣpāyudham api |</l>
<l>yadi straiṇaṃ yamanirata dehārdhaghaṭanād <lb/>avaiti tvām addhā bata varada mugdhā yuvatayaḥ ||</l>

<lg xml:id='Smst_24'>
<l>śmaśāneṣv ākrīḍā smarahara piśācāḥ sahacarāś <lb/>citābhasmālepaḥ srag api nṛkaroṭīparikaraḥ |</l>
<l>amāṅgalyaṃ śīlaṃ tava bhavatu nāmaivam akhilaṃ <lb/>tathāpi smart.Rṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalam asi ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_24'>
<lg>

<lg xml:id='Smst_25'>
<l>manaḥ pratyakcitte savidham avadhāyāttamarutaḥ <lb/>prahṛṣyadromāṇaḥ pramadasalilotsaṅgitadṛśaḥ |</l>
<l>yad ālokyāhlādaṃ hrada iva nimajyāmṛtamaye <lb/>dadhaty antas tattvaṃ kim api yaminas tat kila bhavān ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_25'>
<lg>

<lg xml:id='Smst_26'>

<l>paricchinnām evaṃ tvayi pariṇatā bibhrati giraṃ <lb/>na vidmas tat tattvaṃ vayam iha tu yat tvaṃ na bhavasi ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Smst_26'>
